definitions.definition: To imply but stop short of saying explicitly.
definitions.example: Are you suggesting that I killed my wife?

definitions.definition: To make one suppose; cause one to suppose (something).
definitions.example: The name "hamburger" suggests that hamburgers originated from Hamburg.

definitions.definition: To mention something as an idea, typically in order to recommend it
definitions.example: I’d like to suggest that we go out to lunch.   I’d like to suggest going out to lunch.

definitions.definition: To seduce; to prompt to evil; to tempt.
